snippet.title: ITER Reveal 'Remix' Trailer - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
Watch the remixed version of the reveal trailer for fluckyMachine and Fireshine Games' mining/tower defence hybrid. Journey to the surface - explore, develop, fight, die… repeat! Welcome to the frontline! Workers are as expendable as they are useful. Your job is to mine resources, upgrade equipment, defend your base and restore power to the Undercity.

Wishlist today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2832310

#convergenceshow #indiegame
